summary: Phase 2 Consulting Flow Testing Complete - SOW Change Requests and Payment Reminders. All 14 backend tests passed (100%) and all 9 frontend features tested successfully. SOW Change Requests page loads with stage navigation, tabs for My Requests/Pending Approval, and working New Change Request dialog. Payment Reminders page shows stats cards (Total, Overdue, Due Soon, Upcoming) and payment cards with installment details. ViewToggle works on both pages.

issues: Hydration warning for nested span/tr inside tbody/table - cosmetic issue from dynamic rendering wrapper, no functional impact

critical_code_review_comments: SOW Change Requests API properly implements create, list, pending, approve, reject endpoints with role-based access
Payment Reminders API correctly calculates upcoming payments based on project start date and payment frequency
Frontend pages have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Stage navigation correctly shows Stage 4 (SOW Management) for SOW Changes and Stage 6 (Payments) for Payment Reminders
ViewToggle component properly switches between Card and List views on both pages
seed_data_creation: Created 2 test SOW change requests: TEST_Add New Consulting Scope (Applied), TEST_Modify Scope for Rejection (Rejected)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 Consulting Flow features fully tested. SOW Change Requests page at /consulting/sow-changes allows consultants to request changes with RM approval workflow. Payment Reminders page at /consulting/payments shows upcoming payment installments with filtering by status (overdue, due soon, upcoming). Both pages have working ConsultingStageNav and ViewToggle components. Backend APIs for sow-change-requests and payment-reminders are fully functional.

features_tested.New Change Request dialog opens and has: PASSED - Project, Change Type, Title, Description, Requires client approval checkbox
features_tested.Payment Reminders shows stats cards: Tot: PASSED - Displays 60 Total, 0 Overdue, 0 Due Soon, 20 Upcoming
